en.html:
Start your FREE ZenMate VPN trial
and discover:

  • ✓Servers in 74+ countries.
  • ✓Special streaming servers (Netflix, Disney +, BBC iPlayer, Amazon Prime, and more).
  • ✓Smart locations, Whitelist feature, Stealth connection.
  • ✓Apps for all devices (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android).

fr.html:
Lancez votre essai gratuit ZenMate VPN
et découvrez :

  • ✓Des serveurs dans plus de 74 pays.
  • ✓Des serveurs de Streaming dédiés (Netflix, Disney +, BBC iPlayer, Amazon Prime et plus).
  • ✓Des emplacements intelligents, des fonctionnalités Whitelist, Connexion Stealth.
  • ✓Des apps sur chaque appareil (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android).

de.html:
Beginne deinen KOSTENLOSEN Testzeitraum für ZenMate VPN
Und entdecke:

  • ✓Server in über 74 Ländern.
  • ✓Spezielle Streaming-Server (Netflix, Disney +, BBC iPlayer, Amazon Prime und weitere).
  • ✓Intelligente Standorte, Whitelist-Funktion, Stealth-Verbindung.
  • ✓Apps für alle Geräte (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android).

nl.html:
Start uw GRATIS ZenMate VPN-proefversie
En ontdek:

  • ✓Servers in meer dan 74 landen.
  • ✓Speciale streamingservers (Netflix, Disney +, BBC iPlayer, Amazon Prime en meer).
  • ✓Slimme locaties, Witte lijst, Verborgen verbinding.
  • ✓Apps voor alle apparaten (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android).
nl.subCta: Begin uw gratis test voor 7 dagen

ko.html:
무료 ZenMate VPN 평가판 시작
기능 확인:

  • ✓74개 이상의 국가에 있는 서버.
  • ✓특별 스트리밍 서버(Netflix, Disney +, BBC iPlayer, Amazon Prime 등).
  • ✓스마트 위치, 허용 목록 기능, 스텔스 연결.
  • ✓모든 장치를 위한 앱(Windows, macOS, iOS, Android).

es.html:
Inicie su prueba GRATIS de ZenMate VPN
Y descubra:

  • ✓Servidores en más de 74 países.
  • ✓Servidores especiales de streaming (Netflix, Disney +, BBC iPlayer, Amazon Prime y otros).
  • ✓Ubicaciones inteligentes, función de lista blanca, conexión sigilosa.
  • ✓Aplicaciones para todos los dispositivos (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android).
es.subCta: Iniciar la prueba gratis de 7 días

tr.html:
ÜCRETSİZ ZenMate VPN denemeni başlat
ve keşfedin:

  • ✓74+ ülkede sunucular.
  • ✓Özel çevrimiçi yürütme sunucuları (Netflix, Disney +, BBC iPlayer, Amazon Prime ve daha fazlası).
  • ✓Akıllı konumlar, Beyaz Liste özelliği, Görünmez bağlantı.
  • ✓Tüm cihazlar için uygulamalar (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android).

ru.html:
Начните БЕСПЛАТНЫЙ пробный период ZenMate VPN
И откройте для себя:

  • ✓Серверы в 74+ странах.
  • ✓Специальные серверы для стриминга (Netflix, Disney +, BBC iPlayer, Amazon Prime и другие).
  • ✓Автоматический выбор местоположений, белый список, скрытое подключение.
  • ✓Приложения для всех устройств (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android).
